p: Viral RNA was extracted from infected cell culture supernatants using the QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit (Qiagen). The viral matrix (M) gene was amplified with the SuperScript™ III Platinum™ One-Step qRT-PCR Kit (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA) using primers and Taqman probe previously described (Spackman et al., 2002).
